11.content:
I looked at the mirror knowing that this would be one of the last times the person looking back would be the 18 year old, 6 foot tall 185 pound, version of me with dark brown hair and blue-green eyes. "You just had to testify" I whispered to myself. "You just had to go to the police. Heck, you just had to go to that party"

My family and I had decided that with this being my last summer home before I head off for college we were gonna have a big road trip across the country and spend a couple weeks in California. Not even half way through our time in California, I met a girl who invited me to this party. On my way there I witnessed a murder. I immediately called the police, and identified the guy who did it. Only it turns out the guy was a drug lord who, and after I testified in court he threatened to kill me and my family. No more than 5 minutes later my family and I were taken into protective custody and were on our way to live out the rest of our lives in witness protection. The only problem was that this drug lord has so many connections that we were going to be some of the first people put in a special, super top secret, witness protection. Based on the files they gave all of us, we were all going to be injected with this serum that will completely change our DNA so there would be no way in a thousand years they would find us. The only major problem was that to do this, all of us would have to become the opposite gender. My mom would be my dad, dad my mom. And I would be their daughter.

Realizing the thoughts that looking in the mirror was bringing me, I left the bathroom and rejoined my family in the lounge area we were waiting in. As I sat next to my dad, I said "I'm so sorry about all this"

"Don't be" he replied while placing a hand on my shoulder. "You did exactly what your mother and I raised you to do. It's not your fault that this guy threatened us"

"Yeah, but if I hadn't gone to that party I wouldn't have witnessed the murder. And we wouldn't be here right now"

"You were trying to have the best vacation possible. Your mother and I will never fault you for that"

"I know. I just can't help but feel guilty because of this. I mean" I said, before I was cut off by the one of the marshals.

"The plane is here, let's get going" he said. With that, my parents and I picked up our bags and headed outside where a private jet was waiting for us. We all followed our marshal escorts out to where a jet was waiting for us. As we walked up the steps and entered the jet, I was blown away. I'd flown tons of times in the past, but this was a whole different thing. This plane had recliner chairs and couches. "Wheels up in 5 minutes, I'd get comfortable" the marshal said.

He was right because no more than 6 minutes later we were in the air and off to Seattle. Once we reached our cruising altitude, the marshals went over to a small closet and pulled out a metal briefcase. "What's that?" I asked.

"These are the serums we will be injecting you with to change your DNA and make all of you new people"

"Will it hurt?" My mom asked.

"No" the marshal replied. "It has included in it a drug that will put you to sleep so you won't feel a thing"

"Well" my dad stated. "Let's get this started then"

With that the marshals proceeded to give us the injections. It was no different than getting a flu shot at the doctors office, but unlike a flu shot it wasn't long before my vision started getting foggy and before I knew it I was unconscious. As I slept I thought about who I'd be when I woke up. So far, I was to be moved to the only body available a woman and I didn't know if I'd be average looking or beautiful, blonde or brunette, blue eyes or brown or green. All I knew was it would be like I was meeting a whole new person when I wake up. A person, who, I'd have to know everything about even though I was just meeting her for the first time. And who I would become..

11112.content:
I awoke slowly yawning. It felt like I had just gotten the best nights sleep of my life.

My body however felt awkward, and strange. Lighter in some places and heavier in others. Looking down I could see two modest bumps sticking out from my chest...

That’s when I remembered the serum as I sprang out of bed. I was in a hospital room by myself as I ran over to a mirror and looked at myself.

What I saw could only be described at what I would guess I would have looked like had I been born female.

I was much shorter now only about 5’7 compared to my 6’2 earlier. My skin was the same color but it was much smoother now as al body hair seemed to vanish off me.

My chestnut brown hair was longer touching my shoulders. My nails were also longer and they seemed to be manicured.

I had two small to medium sized breasts sticking out on my chest. I guessed a solid B-cup or so. Not big or anything but very perky and sensitive. My penis had also been replaced as I saw a perfectly well trimmed Vagina were my once proud member had been.

Overall I was rather cute. My face was very feminine and I had nice curves, wide hips and a cute butt. I wasn’t going to win any beauty contests but I was definitely cute looking.

There was a knock on the door as I yelled realizing I was very naked. Seeing a hospital robe in the door I grabbed it and put it on.

The door slowly opened as a man in a white lab coat and another man wearing a black suit entered my room.

“How are we feeling Brittany? Getting used to your new body? It’s okay. My name is Dr. Thompson, this is Agent Mires with witness protection.” He said in a friendly voice.

“How are my parents? Are they okay?” You asked.

“Yes yes my dear. They have actually been up for hours now. They should be joining us shortly.” Dr. Thompson said.

A few minutes later I gasped as my parents walked in my room with their new bodies. My “Mom” looked a lot like what I would have imagined my dad would look like as a woman as vice versa. Both of them seemed happy enough as they smiled to me.

“Normally at this stage of the process you would all he in witness protection already and getting adjusted to your new lives...However...we have a problem.” The Doctor said with a nervous tone.

“Oh no...are we in danger?” My “Mom” said.

“No...no...it’s your new daughter. I’m sorry Brittany. Something didn’t go right with your serum injection. It seems....well you are not done changing yet.” The doctor said.

“I don’t understand. What do you mean.” I asked confused.

The doctor turned off the lights as he turned on a PowerPoint and directed us to the screen.

“You notice here the blood work of both parents. Before and after the change. They are different but equally stable. The cells have adjusted to their bodies. Now take a look here at yours.” The doctor said clicking to the next slide.

On my bloodwork the cells had changed but didn’t seem to be stable. They seemed to be still changing shape slowly.

“It seems someone tampered with your serum. They added an additional formula. One we never would have used on someone like you.” The doctor said nervous.

“What type of formula....?” My “Dad” asked with an angry voice.

“It seems her serum was spiked with a latent....Bimbo formula.” The doctor said sweating our reaction.

“Wait....a what?” I asked still a bit confused.

The doctor clicked to the next slide and showed a picture of a bimbo woman that was used as the base in the serum.

The woman in the slide had long flowing platinum blonde hair that reached down to her wonderful perfectly round ass. She had huge perfectly rounded boobs, wide curves, perfect hourglass shaped body. Long lucsious legs, tan skin, long manicured nails and puffy lips. She looked like the kind of Barbie doll you would see on a porno cover.

“This template was used. Slowly your daughters body and even possibly parts of her personality will start changing to adjust to it.”

I could tell my parents wanted to freak out but I jumped out of my bed to stop them.

“What do you mean my personality will change?” You asked.

“Parts is your personality will adjust to fit the new body. Your sexuality will increase dramatically. You will start craving things like sexier clothes, high heels, etc. you will still be you but you will have new desires.” The doctor said.

“How long does she have?” My “Mom” asked.

“Not long. At this rate maybe a few days maybe a week. Our tests show she will still be a healthy young woman once the changes are complete....just a...”

“Just a total bimbo.” I said looking out the window. I could see several strands of my hair were already looking lighter so I knew this wasn’t a joke.”

“We will find out who did this. However in the mean time let me show you to your new home.” Agent Mires finally said.

The Doctor's words caught the agents off guard.

"Our choices?" They both asked in one voice.

"Yes, my instructions are to provide all three of you with relevant transfers, to help her adjust to her new life."

He offered his phone to the agents, Agent Cochran snatching it before Agent Lachlan's fingers could claw at it. They read the device deliberately, as if expecting the words to change or disappear if they read it hard enough.

The first one, is fine..

The second, makes you think she's a bimbo. That smile too wide, too vacant. She's too proud of her ass, like that all she's got going for her.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/6c/db/4f/...

The third, is blessed with fine, firm titties, full and a juicy ass that you want to pry those ass cheeks apart and ruin her. Your fingers tremble as you imagine yourself on the receiving end. That it's yourself being stuffed beyond what you can bear...
122.title: The file stack of Black women

choices: Reluctantly, you turn over one picture, reading her other details.
The doctor taps his watch impatiently, some deadline must be approaching.
Hoping against hope, you ask for the real selection... the male one.
Feigning indifference, you slide one picture towards the Doctor.
123.content:
Shooting the agents a furious look, you suspect they brought you here 'accidentally'. Fanning out the stack of photos, you admire their beauty. Ratting out the Mob meant you'd done some pretty horrific things yourself, although as a pimp you were redeemed by never having killed anyone. So, you found yourself under the control of the FBI, a victim of your own brand of spying and blackmail.

The taller agent shrugs, as if silently admitting the unvoiced accusation. The shorter one, just crosses his arms daring you to say anything.

"I hope you're not planning on being racist here." The taller man asks.

"Nah." the other agent playfully elbows you in the ribs. "You're more of a sexist, than anything."

Both men smear the pictures together, shuffling the different piles into one.

The variety of women makes you want to recoil, as you look away from the mixed faces looking up from the table. Even the doctor looks put out. Probably his carefully organised files being his concern, rather than your own concern that soon you'd be looking out from one of those particular sets of eyes.

Having had an eye for the ladies, the bustier the better. A fact well-known by the FBI, and part of your downfall, the agents slide various pictures your way.

"How about this one?"

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/c0/63/c1/...

It's quickly covered, as his partner slides a different photo in front of you.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/30/36/18/...

Both selections were obviously nano-enhanced, and terrifyingly feminine.

The taller agent shoves one last one across, "We have a winner."

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/db/ba/10/...

You physically recoil from the table, you hadn't realised the full range of bodies available. Just wishing you were selecting a male body, you know that option is gone. That last body still sending chills down your spine. Even when you ran your own stable, none of your girls were that endowed. The enhanced back and muscles allowing her to walk, but her purpose in life clear to anyone with a set of eyes.

"It's a guaranteed job." The shorter guard sneers, "You'll never be unqualified for it."

"Just giggle pout, and blow a kiss and any mistake will be forgiven."

Echoes of your own words are fired back at you. The mixed flattery, and subtle undermining eating away at a girls confidence and self-belief. You elbow them and get yourself a little space.

Taking the 'hint' both men back away. The job of unsettling you already done. You still hear their reactions as you browse through the available selection.

If you have to be a woman, you'll make her your choice.
123.title: The stack of White women

choices: Pick the first option. You could lie back for most of it, probably.
Take the second option. You'd need time to build back up, and youth would help.
Pick the third option. Her job seems stable, if a bit predicated on her looks.
Try to find another 'good-enough' profile.
1233.content:
You pose the question as an assumption of fact. Of course they aren't actually going to put you in a female body?

However, you're only rewarded with a sinking heart and clammy hands when you look around. The two agents are (poorly) attempting to hide small paroxysms of laughter and the doctor in charge seems flummoxed, his only response so far being a series of confused blinks.

Slowly, the doctor collects himself and gives you the answer you've been dreading.

"Sir, I'm afraid that these are the only bodies we could spare for someone of your ilk." He waves a hand over the array of pictures on the table.

He counts off the reasons on his fingers, to your dismay: "You dropped out of highschool, so we can't in good conscience offer you a profile with higher education; Your particular... profession lends you quite a bit of experience in careers of these types. We've actually had to put quite a number of your victims into protection of these sorts,"

He sends a sharp gaze your way, the first hint of malice he's directed at you so far.

"We can't put you into the position of a-a souteneur, the particular criminal you're testifying against would almost certainly discover a random one popping up; and as for the reason you can't be a male, we simply do not have any prepared on short notice. It is imperative that we assign you a profile as soon as possible — both for your safety and to finally catch this criminal."

You clench your fists. It seems well-reasoned, but you still feel like you're being jerked around by the Feds.

Seeing your evident displeasure, the doctor immediately switches from 'logical robot' into damage control.

"A-ah. I see yo-you're upset, but some of th-these profiles are perfectly enviable! L-look!"

He picks up a random picture, quickly assesses the back — but then quickly puts it down, a visible frown creasing his forehead. He repeats it a few times before you notice a pattern — the ones he doesn't elect to show you are the profiles of whores, prostitutes, and sex workers. It seems these profiles aren't as enviable as he would have thought.

Eventually though, he finds some that fit his example.

"Look, this one has quite the cushy job, and a house all to herself! As long as you quickly adjust to being an adult model, you could live quite comfortably!"

http://66.media.tumblr.com/2bd63e211171e...

You eye her with a dry throat. She resembled one of the blonde girls you 'managed', almost down to a T. And by the sound of it, she did fairly similar things. The doctor continues, however, undeterred.

"And this profile is only nineteen and already financially independent! Th-that may be because she works as a waitress but you could... graduate highschool? Ah, I'm sure that's because she has so much on her plate — we might have to install neural inhibitors elsewise.

https://i.imgur.com/7H6Tdyf.jpg

She looked like one of your 'perfect recruits': guileless, young, struggling a bit with her money. The youth you'd regain was a small boon, but small was the emphatic word.

"And this profile has managed to work her way up to secretary, despite her lack of education! You could use y-your business acumen to maintiain her position!"

https://78.media.tumblr.com/564fdf98464f...

You look at the doctor's face. There's no ironic smirk or sign of trickery in his eyes. He genuinely believes that she was hired for her skills. The agents on either side, meanwhile, are disguising their mirth as coughing fits, their faces red and purple respectively.

You sift through the piles of profiles on the table with increasing fervor. It seemed the doctor was wholly honest about those being among the best there.

Your mind made up, you...
1233.title: Hopes Dashed

choices: You enter lab number 1
Go for lab number 2
It has the be door 3 right?
Run for the exits you can't do it
Something very different...
13.content: The gray is creeping into your hair and your face is showing more weathering... At over six feet tall and 200lbs you have had a very full life... A very active sexual life with your muscular stature. As you peer into your green eyes and see this handsome Caucasian man for the last time... You turn away to face your destiny...
13.title: You see an older more mature man

choices: Teenage girl (18)
Teenage boy (18)
someone else in there 20's
131.content:
You enter Lab 1 and lay on the table as you are told to do and you are injected with something and you go to sleep....

When you wake up you are in what seems like a hospital room but you look over and still see the two marshals that escorted you here, as you lay in bed you realise that you can't reach the end of the bed.

Although your not quite 100% conscious yet the one of the marshals came up to you and said you'll be ok it will just take a little time for you to come around properly, what are you now?
131.title: You enter lab number 1

choices: New born baby girl
Your going to be implanted into a womb and start your life again
Something else
134.content:
You manage to escape some how but as you run down the corridors you realised quickly you can't get out as all the doors are coded.

Then all of a sudden you look around and see has coming out and you fall asleep on the floor.

When you wake up you can't move and one of the marshals walked over to you and says this is because you ran away from us this is your punishment and your mind will not change as it's a punishment and you need to learn for your mistakes.

What has happened to you...your asking yourself....well you've been turned into a.....
134.title: Run for the exits you can't do it

info.brief_description: After witnessing a crime you are placed in a new program to escape death!
info.description: While on a vacation on the West coast of the United States you witness a crime involving a notorious drug lord. Your life is in danger as a huge bounty is placed on your head. You are forced into testifying but the criminals are closing in fast. The FBI feels they can help you by using a new program. You are made a special offer to escape death but it means a whole new life and losing who you are. Given one choice he must accept the help of the Federal Mind Relocation team.
